name: CRYSTAL GOD CHAINS 28"
description:
Solid Copper Wrapped Double Terminated 3"-3-1/2" Quartz Crystal
Comes on a 28" Solid Copper Link Chain
Free Shipping

Double Terminated QUARTZ! These are fairly large Crystals. Double terminated crystals have distinct points at both ends. 
A double termination radiates or absorbs energy at both ends concurrently. 
This causes it to channel energy in two directions at once. 
A double terminated crystal integrates spirit and matter and creates a bridge between two energy points. 
Double terminated stones can increase telepathic ability. 
They strengthen energy flow, and are especially useful when you need to share or exchange energy between you and another person.

name: Star Gate Rings
description:
Copper Wrapped Apophyllite Pyramids

We are proud to offer the exotic Apophyllite in a wearable form in combination with copper.  Apophyllite is not an easy crystal to wear because of its pyramid shape. Once we set our eyes on the crystal the ring basically made itself we immediately knew what to do with it. Now we offer it to you in the StarGate Ring. Thick sturdy solid copper wrapped around an Apophyllite crystal. The Apophyllite Star Gate Rings combine the conductivity of copper and apophyllite to magnify the effect of the crystal. these will last for a long time.

PLEASE READ THE APOPHYLLITE INFO BELOW

Apophyllites are naturally formed Crystal Pyramids. A silicate that naturally grows in a dipyramidal form. They are VERY bright and light reflective crystals. Apophyllite exemplifies the high spiritual vibration of sacred geometry.
Apophyllite stones have a high vibration it is a strong transmitter of energy primarly due to its pyramid shape which allows it to focus energy. A single natural pyramid of Apophyllite can energetically clear a room and is one of the very few minerals considered powerful enough to clear negative energies out of quartz crystals, therefore it is used to clean and clear other crystals. 
Apophyllite is a spiritual energizer and helps to open you up to spiritual awakening by infusing your ethereal body/auric field with the energies of higher dimensions/realms. Apophyllite stimulates the pineal gland (third eye) and is a crystal of the Crown Chakra
It enhances vision and healing work often referred to as the "Reiki Stone".
Apophyllite is an aid in meditation and helps make a conscious connection with the spiritual world. It helps with "tuning in" in accordance with ones consciousness and intention. 
The stone is beneficial when used in self-analysis as it encourages truthfulness in examining our own deficiencies.
The resonance of Apophyllite aids you to release negative energy.
An increase in clairvoyance is a common outcome of using Apophyllite it is said to open up or stimulate psychic abilities. It can also promote structure and organization in daily life. Apophyllite can help one to plan for their future with certainty, despite any negative past experiences, and are also helpful with decision making.
This Stone is used by many for astro travelling and remote viewing which is part of the reason for its name Star Gate Pyramid.
Apophyllite is an excellent healer.
It is an aid to depression, anxiety and stress related issues. It will help to dissolve blockages in many areas of the body, and may be combined with any other stone to boost that stone's energy to bring through healing.
It is used to aid allergic asthma... by placing a piece on the chest and helps with the lymphatic system due to its high water content.
It also aids your respiratory system, your eyes, and improves memory. 
Apophyllite is the birthstone of Gemini and Libra	
The Apophyllite Star Gate Rings combine the conductivity of copper and apophyllite to magnify the effect of the crystal.

name: Copper Wrapped Lemurian Crystal
description:
100% Solid Copper Wrapped Lemurian Crystal
Includes Copper Ball chain

Considered one of the "Master Crystals"
Lemurian Quartz Crystals help us maintain our connection to Spirit, aiding spiritual evolution, and have been used successfully in dream work. 
Lemurian Quartz Crystals were originally found in Brazil.  Metaphysical Legend states that there was once an advanced ancient civilization called Lemuria, similar to Atlantis but more spiritually developed and peaceful.  As the end of their time on Earth was coming to an end, the Lemurians programmed these crystals to teach their messages of oneness and healing - messages that would be revealed when the energy on Earth was ready to receive them.  The Lemurians then planted (or “seeded”) the Lemurian Crystals, encoded with their ancient knowledge and wisdom, to be found centuries later by us.

The legend continues to state that Lemurian Seed Crystals are planted in a grid pattern over the surface of the Earth and beyond, to other stars and dimensions.  When you connect to a Lemurian Crystal and the energy it contains, you are also connecting to this grid of associated energies from the Earth, the stars, and beyond

Moonstone helps balance the emotional body, especially any aggressive tendencies in males or females.  Moonstone is very soothing and used to help relieve stress.  Many women like Moonstone for its ability to balance hormonal and menstrual cycles

This Piece was made for the Woman it caters to the feminine energy that embodies her
